Collection.LongName: ASTER Level 1 precision terrain corrected registered at-sensor radiance
Collection.DataSetId: ASTER Level 1 precision terrain corrected registered at-sensor radiance V003
Collection.Description: ASTER Level 1 Precision Terrain Corrected Registered At-Sensor Radiance

Contact.HoursOfService: M-F, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Central Time

Address.StreetAddress: U.S. Geological Survey, Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center

Instrument.LongName: Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERMapProjection
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The map projection of the granule

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FlyingDirection
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The satellite flight direction when observation was performed

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GenerationDateandTime
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Date and Time granule produced

AdditionalAttribute.Name: LowerLeftQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the lower left quadrant

AdditionalAttribute.Name: LowerRightQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the lower right quadrant

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Resampling
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Method used in the calculation of new DN (digital number) for pixels created during geometric correction of a digital scene, based on the values in the local area around the uncorrected pixels.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SceneCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of cloud coverage for the whole scene

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Solar_Azimuth_Angle
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Angle of the sun clockwise from true North

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Solar_Elevation_Angle
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Angle of the sun above the horizon

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SWIR_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the SWIR sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttribute.Name: TIR_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the TIR sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttribute.Name: UpperLeftQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the upper left quadrant

AdditionalAttribute.Name: UpperRightQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the upper right quadrant

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VNIR1_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the VNIR1 sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VNIR2_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the VNIR2 sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band1_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 1 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band2_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 2 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band3B_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 3B - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band3N_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 3N - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band4_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 4 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band5_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 5 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band6_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 6 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band7_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 7 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band8_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 8 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band9_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 9 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band10_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 10 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band11_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 11 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band12_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 12 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band13_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 13 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Band14_Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the status of Band 14 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttribute.Name: RadiometricDBVersion
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The version number of the Radiometric Database used in Level 1 processing.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GeometricDBVersion
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The version number of the Geometric Database used in Level 1 processing.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERGains
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Identifies the Gain setting for the Bands: HGH, NOR, LO1, LO2, LOW, OFF

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERProcessingCenter
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Name of the center where these ASTER data were processed

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERVNIRPointingAngle
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Visible Near Infrared (VNIR) sensor

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERSWIRPointingAngle
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Shortwave Infrared (SWIR) sensor

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERTIRPointingAngle
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Thermal Infrared (TIR) sensor

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERMapOrientationAngle
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Denotes the angle between the path oriented image and the map oriented image for this ASTER scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ASTERReceivingCenter
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Name of the center where these ASTER data were received

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttribute.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FullResolutionVisibleBrowseAvailable
AdditionalAttribute.Description: This attribute tells whether a full resolution visible image browse was created for the L1T granule, the answer being either 'YES' or 'NO'.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FullResolutionThermalBrowseAvailable
AdditionalAttribute.Description: This attribute tells whether a full resolution thermal image browse was created for the L1T granule, the answer being either 'YES' or 'NO'.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: CorrectionAchieved
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The identifier to inform the user of the level of correction achieved for the product. (The choices are: Terrain+Precision, Terrain+Systematic, Systematic, Precision)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: NumberGCPChipsCorrelated
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of ground control points (GCPs) that correlated in the Precision correction.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SpheroidCode
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Specifies the Earth-model spheroid used for the projection.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: UTMZoneNumber
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The value used to indicate the scene's zone number in UTM coordinates.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QABrowseAvailable
AdditionalAttribute.Description: This attribute tells whether a quality verification of the geometric accuracy of the L1T granule was performed and thus a QA Browse image was created, the answer being either 'YES' or 'NO'.

CollectionAssociation.CollectionUse: Raw sensor counts to be converted to radiometric values

OnlineResource.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
